<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Reinforce Eidolon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1050)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 145 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** your [eidolon](/classes/summoner/eidolons)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses. Your eidolon gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, plus resistance to all damage equal to half the spell's level. Your eidolon can benefit from either [_boost eidolon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1045) or _reinforce eidolon_, but not both; if you cast one of these spells during the other's duration, the newer spell replaces the older one.
name: Reinforce Eidolon
